author: PA News Agency
title: Off-road drivers were swept away by river, says man who tried to save them | Glasgow Times
text:
A man who tried to save three men trapped in a submerged 4√ó4 vehicle said they were ‚Äúswept away‚Äù as they attempted to cross a river.
Emergency services including police, ambulance and a helicopter attended a location on the River Esk near Glaisdale shortly before midday on Thursday.
A 4√ó4 was recovered from the river by the fire service just after 3pm and three men found inside had died, North Yorkshire Police said.
Chris Ford, who lives nearby, told the PA news agency the men were part of an off-roading group when they crossed a ford on Rake Lane.
The river, swollen by heavy rain, swept them away and carried them around 400 yards downstream, he said.
Emergency services have been dealing with a serious incident on Thursday (28 December) involving a 4√ó4 vehicle in the River Esk near Glaisdale on the North York Moors üö®
Three men sadly died at the scene.
More information is available here ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/KgxPhHATO4 pic.twitter.com/AvDT3TiqCk
‚Äî North Yorkshire Police (@NYorksPolice) December 28, 2023
It came as Storm Gerrit caused flooding and travel chaos across the country throughout Wednesday and Thursday.
Mr Ford, a firewood salesman, was called to the scene to help recover the vehicle with his tractor and found it fully submerged beneath the water, he said.
He and two others used tractors to pull the 4√ó4 on to the riverbank, he said.
Police said another man, who attempted to help those trapped in the car, was pulled from the river and needed medical treatment.
Mr Ford told PA: ‚ÄúThere was a ford they were going over and they were swept down 400 yards.
‚ÄúThey were part of an off-road club.
‚ÄúI went down with my tractor. There was a couple of vehicles ‚Äì one parked up.
‚ÄúYou couldn‚Äôt see the (other) vehicle. It was 3ft beneath the water.
‚ÄúI helped get it out on to the riverbank with three other tractors.‚Äù
Two other locals, Rosie and Andrew Dale, said they were with Mr Ford when he got the call to help.
They said they saw several 4√ó4 vehicles pass their home in the direction of the ford shortly before the incident.
Mrs Dale said ‚Äúnobody local‚Äù would attempt to cross the ford in the current conditions.
The area is popular with 4√ó4 drivers, she said, adding: ‚ÄúIn the summer you get 10 of them at a time.‚Äù
A spokesperson for North Yorkshire Police said: ‚ÄúLocalised conditions across our area are making driving hazardous.
‚ÄúRoads are particularly badly affected around the River Esk, to the north of the county, as we have seen with the tragic incident near Glaisdale.
‚ÄúThere was another incident at nearby Houlsyke at 12.49pm when a car got stuck in flood water and another at Kirby Wiske in Hambleton at 2.35pm.
‚ÄúThankfully, the occupants of both vehicles were brought to safety.
‚ÄúThe key advice is to consider whether your journey is necessary.
‚ÄúPlease avoid driving through any kind of standing or moving flood water if you possibly can.‚Äù
Witnesses to the incident at Glaisdale are urged to call North Yorkshire Police on 101, option 4, quoting reference NYP-28122023-0146.

author: Redazione ANSA
title: Ricevuto dal Papa il custode del Sacro Convento di Assisi
text:
Il custode del Sacro
convento di San Francesco in Assisi, fra Marco Moroni, √® stato
ricevuto da Papa Francesco. Gli ha consegnato una pergamena
partita da Jesolo lo scorso 2 dicembre in occasione
dell'inaugurazione del Sand Nativity contenente un messaggio dei
ragazzi della citt√† veneta.
Nel contesto della collaborazione tra il Sacro Convento e il Comune di Jesolo per ricordare gli 800 anni del presepe di Greccio, infatti, gli alunni delle scuole della cittadina veneta hanno approfondito il valore degli incontri nella vita di san Francesco. La sala stampa del Sacro Covento sottolinea che tra i frutti di questo percorso c'√® il messaggio che i ragazzi hanno consegnato a fra Marco il giorno dell'inaugurazione del Sand Nativity, perch√© lo recapitasse a papa Francesco.
"Come avevo promesso ai ragazzi di Jesolo il 2 dicembre - ha dichiarato fra Marco -, avendo avuto la possibilit√† di incontrare papa Francesco gli ho consegnato personalmente il loro messaggio. √à stata l'occasione per raccontargli la bella esperienza di condivisione tra Jesolo e il Sacro Convento per gli 800 anni del Natale di san Francesco a Greccio. Il Papa ha ringraziato di cuore e benedice i ragazzi e le loro famiglie".
"A papa Francesco, siamo come i granelli di sabbia: solo vicini, uniti e solidali potremo diventare una meravigliosa opera d'arte. Questo √® il nostro augurio. Questa √® la nostra speranza" il testo del messaggio.
Riproduzione riservata ¬© Copyright ANSA

author: LA VERDAD
title: La Comunidad se implica en la Carta Mediterr√°nea de Adaptaci√≥n al Clima
text:
Secciones
Servicios
Destacamos
LA VERDAD
Murcia
Jueves, 3 de octubre 2024, 23:38
Necesitas ser suscriptor para acceder a esta funcionalidad.
Opciones para compartir
La secretaria auton√≥mica de Energ√≠a, Sostenibilidad y Acci√≥n Clim√°tica, Mar√≠a Cruz Ferreria, asiste en representaci√≥n de la Comunidad a la Conferencia de las Regiones Perif√©ricas Mar√≠timas (CRMP), que se celebra en Malta y en la que se est√° dando un impulso a la Carta Mediterr√°nea de Adaptaci√≥n al Clima.
Este documento pretende reforzar el papel de las Administraciones en las pol√≠ticas e iniciativas europeas a escala mediterr√°nea, entre ellas la gesti√≥n integrada de los sistemas costeros y los espacios naturales, as√≠ como la adaptaci√≥n al cambio clim√°tico.
Ferreira intervino en la reuni√≥n plenaria de la Comisi√≥n Intermediterr√°nea (CIM), donde resalt√≥ que ¬´nos encontramos en un momento crucial en el marco de las nuevas instituciones europeas y, como regiones, hemos de concienciar y asegurar que la legislaci√≥n europea responda de forma pertinente a los desaf√≠os que vivimos, especialmente las regiones del sur de Europa frente al cambio clim√°tico¬ª.
El principal objetivo de la reuni√≥n de ayer era presentar y recoger reacciones a la versi√≥n final de la nueva Carta Mediterr√°nea para la Adaptaci√≥n al Cambio Clim√°tico, que se espera aprobar en la siguiente sesi√≥n por los miembros de la CIM, y poder tener un debate sobre la acci√≥n clim√°tica en las regiones mediterr√°neas.
Asimismo, en el encuentro se reivindic√≥ la necesidad de incrementar las partidas dedicadas a la adaptaci√≥n clim√°tica y a la recolecci√≥n de datos para los territorios. ¬´La mejor manera de aprovechar los recursos a nuestro alcance tiene que partir de una buena informaci√≥n y esta solo se puede obtener a trav√©s de unos fondos que nos permitan trabajar con la mayor exactitud posible¬ª, asegur√≥ Ferreira.
¬´Es necesario un marco de cooperaci√≥n integrado para implementar una acci√≥n de adaptaci√≥n al cambio clim√°tico conjunta. Asimismo, pedimos que se cree a nivel euromediterr√°neo una estrategia macrorregional integrada que pueda incluir un eje de trabajo principal sobre el cambio clim√°tico¬ª, a√±adi√≥ la secretaria de Energ√≠a, Sostenibilidad y Acci√≥n Clim√°tica.
